ai-patthana21.29:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles, namely, discussing the extent of the Teaching,
ai-patthana21.29:1.1_0: or give rise to confidence in those without it,
ai-patthana21.29:1.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana21.29:2.1_1: Not with cause or reason, the teaching doesn’t give rise to cause or reason.
ai-patthana21.29:2.1_2: ‘... for the sake of conditioned things.’ ...
ai-patthana21.29:2.1_3: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana21.29:3.1_0: Also, not based on the teaching, there is a cause of reason,
ai-patthana21.29:3.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
